602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a6: Reach families through facebook with an CPA of <$25

602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a4: People searching for hydratation in hot summer days
602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a6: Test campaign to see if we can get CTR>2% and CPA<$15

602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a10: Test more of similar campaign types.
602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a4: Targeting people looking for eliminating plastic bottles waste
602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a9: Our conversion rate seem excellent (~7%) while we stayed way below budget.

602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a10: Fine tune the campaign to stay within budget or even further lower the costs.
602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a4: People interested in having a cold drink in summer heat waves.
602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a6: Get them to purchase our flask or share with friends/family
602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a9: We were able to almost fit under $25 in CPA, but we surpassed expected CTR (4%)

602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a4: People who already bought our flask.
602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfde.a6: Make them share their success story with friends.
Make people buy a flask for their friends as well

602ff2d05e5ec4476f5fbfdd.a3: There's an easier way to keep your family hydrated.
The most high-tech cooling and antibacterial beverage protection.
Drinking doesn't need to create plastic waste.
We believe that you can stay hydrated with a fresh cold water – no matter where you are.
The only flask you can take wherever, whenever.
